data.title: Pension Funds
data.text:
Amundi-ACBA asset management manages three mandatory pension funds, benefiting from the Amundi advanced know-how, expertise and technical support on fund management activities.

Participants' interest is foremost in everything we do; Acting fairly and in the best interest of participants, with due skill, care and diligence, employing effectively the resources and procedures which are needed for the proper performance of our duties.

Amundi-ACBA aims to become a leading Armenian investor recognized for product performance and transparency, quality of participants' relationship based on a long-term approach, efficiency in its organization, commitment to sustainable and socially responsible development.

Work experience

Since March 2018: Chairman of the Board of Directors of ACBA Leasing CJSC.

2017-2018: Chairman of the Union of Banks of Armenia.

Since May 2014: Board Chairman of Amundi-ACBA Asset Management CJSC.

April 2014: Chief Executive Officer of ACBA Bank OJSC.

In 2006: reappointed the Deputy CEO of ACBA-CREDIT AGRICOLE BANK CJSC once the Bank was reorganized and renamed.

From 1996-2006: Deputy CEO of the Agricultural Cooperative Bank of Armenia.

Education

He graduated from Yerevan State Economic University, the faculty of Accounting and Economic Analysis and received the qualification of an economist.

Birth Date: November 12th, 1962.

Work experience

Since 2023: Deputy Head of JV supervision and Partnerships

Since 2022: Board Member of Amundi-Acba.

From 2016 to 2022: Head of Financial Communication at Amundi

From 2010 to 2016: Head of Financial Communication at Lagardere

From 2002 to 2010: Head of Financial Communication at Bouygues

From 1999 to 2001: Financial Communication Officer at Air Liquide

From 1996 to 1999: Business development officer at AGF AM (now Allianz Global Investors)

Education

Master degrees in Finance and Economics from Institut d’Etudes Politiques de Paris (France)

Master degrees in Law from Aix en Provence Law School (France)

Birth Date: January 27th, 1970.

Work experience

Since 2016 to now: appointed as the Chief Executive Officer of Amundi-ACBA Asset Management. At the same time, he oversees Joint Ventures established by Amundi Group in various countries around the world.

From 2016 to 2010: joined Amundi Group, the European leader in Asset Management. He handled a portfolio of Corporate and major French institutions' clients at Société Générale, then at LCL Bank.

From 1998 to 2010: he was trader of bond and derivative instruments at Société Générale Asset Management.

Education

Jean Mazedjian holds two Master degrees in Economics and Energy Policy at the National Institute of Nuclear Sciences and Techniques of Saclay and at Paris Nanterre University.

Birth Date: November 7th, 1972.

Work experience

Since 2014 to now: Head of Internal audit of Amundi-Acba.

From 2020 to 2022: Head of Project Management and SAP Business Consultancy Department of Acba Bank.

From 2015 to now: visiting professor of ASUE, acting as an assistant at the Chair of Managerial Accounting and Auditing.

From 2011 to 2019: occupied a position of an Internal auditor in Acba Bank.

From 2007 to 2011: started to work at Shengavit Branch of Acba Bank as a credit specialist, 7 months later transferred to the Credit Directorate of Headquarter.

Education

Certified Internal Auditor (CIA) since 2019, since 2014 is a member of the Institute of Internal Auditors (IIA).

Certified Scrum Master (CSM), also holds Project Management Institute (PMI) Membership.

Graduated from Armenian State University of Economics in 2006, holding a degree in Economics and continued her education as a postgraduate student at the same University.

Birth Date: December 30th,1984.

Work experience

Since 2018 to now: Deputy CEO alongside his work as Fund Manager.

Since 2017 to now: Member of the Board of Trustees of "Stepan Gishyan" Charitable Foundation.

From 2015 to 2018: Member of the Board of Directors at ACBA Leasing.

From 2014 to now: acts as Fund manager of Amundi-Acba.

From 2011 to 2014: was the head of ACBA’s trading department.

From 2010 to 2011: occupied the position of Senior Trader at ACBA-Credit Agricole Bank.

From 2007 to 2010: appointed as a specialist in Strategic planning, analysis, assets and liabilities management at ACBA-Credit Agricole Bank.

Education

Became a CFA Charterholder since 2019, and is a member of the Institute.

From 2008 holds a PhD degree in Economics from Yerevan State Institute of Economics.

Graduated from Armenian State University of Economics in 2005.

Birth Date: November17th, 1983.

Work experience

Since 2022: promoted as Fund Manager.

From 2020 to 2022: acted as junior Fund Manager.

From 2019 to 2020: occupied the position of the Risk and Compliance Officer.

From 2016 to 2019: after joining Amundi-Acba team,she worked as a Middle Officer for 3 years.

From 2011 to 2016: held a Bank Dealer position in Acba Bank.

From 2008 to 2011: was a Teller at Shengavit Branch of Acba Bank.

Education

Since 2013 holds an ACI Dealing Certificate.

From 2008 holds a Master degree in Accounting and Audit from Armenian State University of Economics.

Graduated in 2006, from State Engineering University of Armenia, in Economics and Management of Enterprises (In the Energetic field).

Birth Date: November 30th,1984.
